attributes.action: Pressure the BBC to ban Eastenders
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Eastenders is depressing. It teaches impressionable viewers to suspect the worst in others and that the only way to succeed is through aggression.    Quite simply, Eastenders is not good for the mental wellbeing of the country and should be axed.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
